column2: wrdsci, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I have been on Demadex since 2003 when a sudden water retention occured. Same condition my maternal grandmother had at the same age.Tried the generic torsemide which did not work.Excellent results with Demadex. Be sure to have a restroom available because it works within a half hour. I have had no side effects but I do eat a banana/day for potasium depletion and  have regular blood tests. Recommend highly.
